title.narrative: PROGRAM PLANNING/MONITORING/EVALUATION

description.narrative: The effectiveness of the programme delivery and results is reinforced through improved quality of programme planning, monitoring and evaluation at both central and decentralized levels., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation, Evaluation And Research, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Innovation, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind, United Nations Working Together. condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The effectiveness of the programme delivery and results is reinforced through improved quality of programme planning, monitoringand evaluation at both central and decentralized levels.

description.narrative: Le mécanisme de suivi de la performance du programme, à travers les exercices participatifs de revues semestrielles et annuelles, ont permis d’établir le bilan de progrès, d’identifier les défis et contraintes et prendre des mesures correctives. Pour ce faire,les directives appropriées pour la planification, le suivi et le reporting, ainsi que l’appui adéquat aux membres de équipes de l’UNICEF et des partenaires de mise en œuvre, ont contribué de manière significative à l&39;obtention des résultats attendus, et cela, conformément aux exigences et procédures de l’organisation et dans les délais impartis. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:02/02/2022
